thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend break
thread.title_full: Weekend break - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: wilkie74
title: Weekend break
text:
The entrance doesn't do the interior justice
Quite scruffy and could do with some TLC as the building is beautiful with views over the park in front
Smart reception and friendly staff greet you on arrival and the rooms very well decorated
One point I would make is in this day and age better coffee making facilities in the rooms would be better
I have visited hotels lately that have a small cafeteria and coffee for guests.
The continental breakfast was good also.
The hotel had a bar area and a small gym on site
It is only a short walk to Victoria station and the tube
If you travel by car I don't think they had off street parking
